Contradict fact: The claim that the image shows the new WTO Director-General as a young girl contradicts the fact that the photographer confirmed it is not her.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that the image is not of Okonjo-Iweala as a child, as confirmed by the photographer and supported by the metadata analysis.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a Facebook post with a caption, but there is no substantial evidence or verification to confirm its accuracy.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image depicts Okonjo-Iweala as a child without any concrete evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image is part of a series of portraits taken by the photographer and is not of Okonjo-Iweala as claimed.
